thread.section_title: Easyprint UK Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Easyprint UK | easyprint.com
thread.title: FliteView

author: FliteView
title: FliteView
text:
Great Quality, Fantastic Price and Super fast delivery!
Ordered some business cards from Easyprint, by far the cheapest on the web in terms of quality and price. Really good quality and speedy delivery!
The order process is simple, you can upload your own artwork, images, backgrounds and photos. The layouts are fully adjustable and easy to work with. Do make sure you select the correct amount of business cards you require, its free currently for 250, but not free for 25! Overall the service is excellent, I would have no trouble recommending them to any one of my friends/family/colleagues.
My only criticism would be the packaging, having used Vista Print in the past, business cards are usually packaged within a suitable sized box.
Great!
